import React, { Component } from "react"; import '../css/module.css'; import Section from '../components/section' export default class Physics extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ currentActive:"Aims", active:{"Aims":1,"Credits":0,"Prerequisites":0,"Lecturer/s":0,"Followup Courses":0,"Structure":0,"Assessment":0,"Textbooks":0,"Syllabus":0}, modules:[], direction:"up", currentId:"" } var xmlhttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); var oldThis=this; xmlhttp.onreadystatechange = function() { if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) { // document.getElementById("result").innerHTML=this.responseText; var result=JSON.parse(this.responseText) oldThis.setState({ modules:result }) } }; xmlhttp.open("GET", "https://modules-api-253412.firebaseapp.com/api/v1/modules", true); xmlhttp.send(); } componentDidMount(){ this.setState({ currentId:"", result:"" }) } handleSelect= e => { this.setState({ currentId:e.target.parentNode.id }) } renderModuleRow(){ var content=[] var modules=this.state.modules for (var i = 0; i <= modules.length - 1;i++) { content.push( {modules[i]['id']} {modules[i]['name']} {modules[i]['year']} ); } return content } /* COMP 14112 Fund. of Artificial Intelligence 1 PHYS 10071 Mathematics 1 1 PHYS 10101 Dynamics 1 PHYS 10121 Quantum Physics and Relativity 1 PHYS 10191 Introduction to Astrophysics 1 PHYS 10280 Year 1 Laboratory 1 PHYS 10302 Vibrations and Waves 1 PHYS 10342 Electricity & Magnetism 1 PHYS 10352 Properties of Matter 1 PHYS 10372 Mathematics 2 1 PHYS 10471 Random Processes in Physics 1 PHYS 10672 Advanced Dynamics 1 MATH 20122 Metric Spaces 2 PHYS 20040 General Paper I 2 PHYS 20101 Intro. to Quantum Mechanics 2 PHYS 20141 Electromagnetism 2 PHYS 20161 Intro. to Programming for Physicists 2 PHYS 20171 Mathematics of Waves and Fields 2 PHYS 20252 Fundamentals of Solid State Physics 2 PHYS 20280 Year 2 Laboratory 2 PHYS 20312 Wave Optics 2 PHYS 20352 Thermal & Stat. Physics 2 PHYS 20401 Lagrangian Dynamics 2 PHYS 20672 Complex Vars. & Vector Spaces 2 PHYS 20872 Theory Computing Project 2 PHYS 20811 Professional Development 2 PHYS 30121 Introduction to Particle and Nuclear Physics 3 PHYS 30151 Thermal Physics of Bose and Fermi Gases 3 PHYS 30180 Third Year Laboratory 3 PHYS 30201 Fundamentals of Quantum Mechanics 3 PHYS 30441 Electrodynamics 3 PHYS 30471 Introduction to Non-Linear Dynamics 3 COMP 39112 Quantum Computing 3 PHYS 30672 Mathematical Methods for Physics 3 PHYS 40202 Advanced Quantum Mechanics 3 PHYS 30392 Cosmology 3 PHYS 40352 Solid State Physics 3 PHYS 40222 Particle Physics 3 */ compareDescending = (a,b) => { if(a['year']>b['year']){ return -1 } else if (a['year'] { if(a['year']b['year']){ return 1 } else { return 0 } } reOrder = e => { var oldOrder=this.state.modules; var newOrder; if(e.target.className==="fa fa-chevron-down"){ newOrder=[...oldOrder].sort(this.compareAscending) this.setState({ direction:"up", modules:newOrder }) } else{ newOrder=[...oldOrder].sort(this.compareDescending) this.setState({ direction:"down", modules:newOrder }) } } renderTable() { return( {this.renderModuleRow()}
Module ID Name Year
); } toggle = (toggle,name) => { var oldActive=this.state.active oldActive[name]=1 oldActive[this.state.currentActive]=0 var xmlhttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); var oldThis=this; xmlhttp.onreadystatechange = function() { if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) { // document.getElementById("result").innerHTML=this.responseText; var result=JSON.parse(this.responseText) oldThis.setState({ result:result[oldThis.state.active] }) } }; xmlhttp.open("GET", "https://modules-api-253412.firebaseapp.com/api/v1/modules/"+this.state.currentId, true); xmlhttp.send(); this.setState({ active:oldActive, currentActive:name }) } showSections= e => { var content=[] var sections=this.state.active for (var i = 0; i <= Object.keys(sections).length - 1;i++) { var sect= Object.keys(sections)[i]; content.push(
); } return content } renderInfo(){ return(
    {this.showSections()}

I am currently in my final and fourth year of studies in (MPhys) Physics with Theoretical Physics. The following are the modules I have attended at university.

Please click on the name of a module to see information about it in the panel to the right or bottom of screen.
